thread.title: Portuguese rider Luis Pinto maintains Hero MTB 2015 lead on Day 3
thread.title_full: Portuguese rider Luis Pinto maintains Hero MTB 2015 lead on Day 3 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Portuguese rider Luis Pinto maintains Hero MTB 2015 lead on Day 3
text:
SHIMLA: Portuguese rider Luis Leao Pinto maintained his lead in Hero MTB 2015, while Andi Seewald pedalled a place way up to the second spot on an exciting Day 3 action on Tuesday.
The 2013 edition winner Pinto, who was the first one to complete the race, was 16 seconds ahead of Seewald, who finished second while Pau Zamora was in the third position.
Kiran Kumar Raju, who finished 10th, was the only Indian to feature in the top-10 riders so far.
In the "Queen's stage" the riders today covered a distance of 80 kms out of which 78 km were competitive section.
The elevation gain was 2082 metres with highest elevation being 2296 metres.
What appeared to be an easy ride got tougher in the last few kilometres leading to the meadows of Kullu Sarahan.
Yesterday on Day 2, two riders, Pedro Campos and Rodrigo Cunha suffered minor injuries and were immediately transferred to Fortis Hospital, Mohali.
The riders had suffered crashes on a downhill section.
